UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Cecropin-4 Derived Peptides against Methicillin-Resistant Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Peng J, Mishra B, Khader R, Felix LO, Mylonakis E

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium E007(MIC=>58.59µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29231(MIC=>58.59µM),Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC=29.3µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae WGLW2(MIC=>58.59µM),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 7978(MIC=58.59µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=>58.59µM),Klebsiella aerogenes ATCC 13048(MIC=>58.59µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=>58.59µM)
